Class Answer

java.lang.Object
application.Answer
public class Answer extends Object
The Answer class is a model representing an answer to a question in the system.

It includes fields such as:

  • Answer ID
  • Associated question ID
  • Answer content
  • Author information
  • Boolean indicating if it's a solution
